title: The Beatitudes: The Gentle
description:
Readings from:

Matthew 5:5

Psalm 37:1-11

Today's passages were read by Daniel Im, pastor, podcaster, and author of several books, most recently You Are What You Do: And Six Other Lies about Work, Life, and Love.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
